room_title: Escape room "The Minimalist" by Esc4pe Room in Burlington
review: Awesome. Highly recommend. Super fun with friends. 4-7 people optimal. We did The Minimalist.

room_title: Escape room "The Minimalist" by Esc4pe Room in Burlington
review: My wife and two kids had so much fun in the Gauntlet that we returned the next day to tackle the Minimalist! They do a wonderful job making puzzle solving fun. Thanks, Esc4pe!
